name: Pest Control
description:
Days move fast in your little solar system, and so do the pests! Can you collect enough crops before the invading pests take over your garden?

This fast paced garden defense game features:
  • 24 levels across 4 planets
  • custom levels to set your own challenge
  • control rebinding
  • my blood sweat and tears
  • cute Kenney assets
  • a little guy that goes around
  • a day-night cycle like you wouldn't believe
  • absolutely no plot

It's a little game you go around hitting little guys. You get it. Have fun.
